vote.title: Authorize the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to acquire, develop, and own Standard Shoreline, a mixed-income, multifamily development to be located at 10715 Garland Road (Project) and enter into a seventy-five-year lease agreement with OP Acquisitions, LLC or its affiliate for the development of the Project - Financing: No cost consideration to the City ..title
